title: How do you disable the christmas map?
body: My fucking eyes god help me plz

replies.body:
Either live with it >_< Or don't play over Christmas?

I'm still waiting for a Southern Hemisphere kind of Christmas map, with everything burning hahahaha

> [{quoted}](name=Gesteppie,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=EqJIMUi4,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-12-18T23:32:33.049+0000)
>
> Either live with it >_< Or don't play over Christmas?
> 
> I'm still waiting for a Southern Hemisphere kind of Christmas map, with everything burning hahahaha

http://www.aussievault.com.au/media/vaults/128/entries/images/12566/13283/image-966-644.jpg

The map would be beach themed but with a Christmas touch. And every champion who has either a Pool Party or Snowdown skin would load into the game with either one of them equipped without need to unlock first.

But here goes dreaming.
Haha, I actually quite like it, but in relation to your post I don't actually think there is a way too turn it off, apart from what Jelly Mac said, just play ranked.
